unnormalised: ## New Wheels Alert! What's Hitting the Indian Roads?
normalised: ## New Wheels Alert! What's Hitting the Indian Roads?

unnormalised: Hey gearheads! Time to talk about the shiny new metal making its way onto our beloved Indian roads. This month's been a whirlwind of launches, from budget-friendly hatchbacks to luxury SUVs that would make even Ambani jealous.
normalised: Hey gearheads! Time to talk about the shiny new metal making its way onto our beloved Indian roads. This month's been a whirlwind of launches, from budget-friendly hatchbacks to luxury S U V s that would make even Ambani jealous.

unnormalised: First up, remember all the buzz around the "Desi Drifter"? Well, the new Maruti Suzuki Swift 2024 just dropped, boasting a slick new design and a claimed fuel efficiency that'll keep your wallet happy, even with soaring petrol prices. Rumor has it, its starting price is around Rs. 6 Lakhs. Not bad, eh?
normalised: First up, remember all the buzz around the "Desi Drifter"? Well, the new Maruti Suzuki Swift two thousand and twenty four just dropped, boasting a slick new design and a claimed fuel efficiency that'll keep your wallet happy, even with soaring petrol prices. Rumor has it, its starting price is around rupee six lakhs. Not bad, eh?

unnormalised: Then there's the Tata Nexon facelift. This compact SUV is going head-to-head with the Hyundai Venue and looks seriously revamped. They've even thrown in some cool tech features, reportedly inspired by some high-end European cars. Expect it to be navigating through the streets of Mumbai and Bangalore soon.
normalised: Then there's the Tata Nexon facelift. This compact S U V is going head-to-head with the Hyundai Venue and looks seriously revamped. They've even thrown in some cool tech features, reportedly inspired by some high-end European cars. Expect it to be navigating through the streets of Mumbai and Bangalore soon.

unnormalised: For the luxury lovers, BMW unveiled their new i7 at a swanky event in Delhi. This all-electric beast is packed with features and enough horsepower to make you feel like you're piloting a spaceship. Of course, the price tag reflects that, hovering around Rs. 2 Cr. Think spacious interiors...we're talking palace-on-wheels level spacious, maybe around 300 sq ft.
normalised: For the luxury lovers, B M W unveiled their new i seven at a swanky event in Delhi. This all-electric beast is packed with features and enough horsepower to make you feel like you're piloting a spaceship. Of course, the price tag reflects that, hovering around rupee two crore. Think spacious interiors...we're talking palace-on-wheels level spacious, maybe around three hundred square feet.

unnormalised: Finally, Mahindra is teasing us with their upcoming XUV900 coupe SUV. Speculation is rife that it'll be unveiled around Diwali. Imagine cruising down the Jaipur highway in that!
normalised: Finally, Mahindra is teasing us with their upcoming X U V nine hundred coupe S U V. Speculation is rife that it'll be unveiled around Diwali. Imagine cruising down the Jaipur highway in that!

unnormalised: So, which of these new rides are you eyeing? Let me know in the comments below! And stay tuned for more automotive news from your friendly neighborhood petrolhead. Jai Hind!
